Posts.Content: Dec 1, 2009 12:34PM mjkpuff wrote: Kenalog is a wonderful cream. From what i remember. Used it both on allergic diaper rash, years ago. And also the vet prescribed it for bad friction burn on my dogs mouth/lips As you can guess, noone has ever told me, it burned. I thought it did a great job healing . I'm sorry it's not helping your Mom. Use it sparingly.
